summary: Completed comprehensive backend API testing for DataViz Studio with 100% success rate. All core features working: auth, file upload, datasets, dashboards, charts, and AI integration with GPT-5.2.

infrastructure_issues.issue: External URL mapping not working correctly
infrastructure_issues.details: Public URL https://datapulse-alter.preview.emergentagent.com redirects to Emergent homepage instead of DataViz Studio app
infrastructure_issues.impact: External users cannot access the application, but backend services work perfectly locally
infrastructure_issues.workaround: Backend APIs accessible via localhost:8001, frontend via localhost:3000

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix external URL mapping/ingress configuration - the public URL redirects to wrong domain instead of DataViz Studio app. All backend functionality is working perfectly.
